text: Sharon English is a Canadian writer. Her short story collection Zero Gravity was a shortlisted nominee for the ReLit Awards,ReLit Awards: Short Fiction. Canadian Books & Authors. and a longlisted nominee for the Scotiabank Giller Prize,"Giller Prize list a mix of big, small publishers". Victoria Times- Colonist, September 18, 2007. in 2007. Originally from London, Ontario, she is currently based in Toronto, where she teaches creative writing at the University of Toronto's Innis College. ==Works== *Uncomfortably Numb (2002, ) *Zero Gravity (2006, ) ==References== ==External Links== Sharon English's website Category:1965 births Category:Canadian women short story writers Category:Writers from London, Ontario Category:Living people Category:21st- century Canadian women writers Category:21st-century Canadian short story writers
title: Sharon English
